abstract: Rio Tinto‘s rejection of a $140 billion all-share offer from BHP Billiton is likely to trigger rival bids from resource companies awash with cash from record commodity and stock prices, analysts said.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto‘s rejection of a $140 billion all-share offer from BHP Billiton is likely to trigger rival bids from resource companies awash with cash from record commodity and stock prices, analysts said.

headline.main: BHP’s Rejected Offer for Rio May Trigger Bidding War
